name: Multirotor Sim VR
description:
Win races, perform extreme-speed maneuvers and acrobatics in Virtual Reality Environment to hone your skills and get bonus coins to purchase and repair various spare parts.

A physical model of the drone involves damage of varying severity. Prevent your drone from contact with obstacles. A lifelike drone behaviour and destruction of its individual parts in the crash. Repair and buy different spare parts for boosting characteristics of the drone.

Support Gamepad. It is advisable to connect the Transmitter from your drone!
